channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Chris Rea, rock and blues singer-songwriter, dies aged 74
item.description: Middlesbrough-born musician had hits with Driving Home for Christmas, On the Beach and The Road to Hell Chris Rea, the British singer-songwriter whose...

item.title: Top Senate Democrat moves on legal action over Epstein files release – US politics live
item.description: Chuck Schumer announces he is introducing resolution to force Senate to initiate legal action against justice department for ‘blatant disregard of law...

item.title: Russia ‘ready to legally confirm it has no intention of attacking EU or Nato’ – as it happened
item.description: Comments from deputy foreign minister Sergei Ryabkov carried by state news agency The Guardian’s Russian affairs reporter, Pjotr Sauer , has some more...

item.title: 100-tonne fatberg discovered in east London sewer
item.description: 100-metre-long mass of congealed fats, oil and grease found blocking sewers in Whitechapel area of the capital A “fatberg” weighing an estimated 100 t...

item.title: UK drivers being overcharged as fuel prices fail to track oil market, watchdog finds
item.description: CMA rejects retailers’ claims on operating costs, saying weak competition is not passing on lower wholesale prices Drivers hitting the roads over the ...

item.title: Zendaya and Tom Holland in surprise curry house stop
item.description: The famous couple turned up at the restaurant in Leicestershire while visiting the area to see a show.

item.title: Two identical Banksy murals appear in London
item.description: Banksy confirms a mural in Bayswater and is thought to be behind a second work in central London.

item.title: New Trump envoy says he will serve to make Greenland part of US
item.description: Denmark warns Washington to respect its sovereignty, while Greenland says it will decide its own future.

item.title: Canal boats swallowed by giant hole as major incident declared
item.description: Two boats have been left at the bottom of the cavity, where water has drained away.

item.title: Russian general killed by car bomb in Moscow, officials say
item.description: Lt Gen Fanil Sarvarov is the third military official to have been killed in bomb attacks in the Russian capital over the last year.
